message: Let's start fair. You get 10% and I'll take 90%.
My turn! How about a 70/30 split in my favor?  This is a limited time offer, Alice.
Okay, let's try a different split. I'll take 80% and you can have 20%.  Let's get this done before the inflation bites into our shares even further.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. I'm offering you a very generous 40%. Take it before inflation eats away at your potential gains too!
Alright Bob, let's be reasonable. I'm offering 70% to you, 30% to me. This is my final offer.  If you reject this, we both lose money due to inflation.
